'''Summer Nights' Recollection''' is an outdoor gift set favored by the companion: [[Kamisato Ayaka]], [[Arataki Itto]] and [[Kamisato Ayato]].

The blueprint is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] on [[Tsurumi Island]]. The Remarkable Chest is available after unlocking [[Octave of the Maushiro]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest southwest of the [[Teleport Waypoint]] at Moshiri Ceremonial Site on Tsurumi Island.

For the puzzle, the gadget [[Peculiar Pinion]] is required to activate [[Mysterious Carvings]]. It will then spawn 4 [[Electro Cube]]s, which, after activating, will grant you the Remarkable Chest. The gadget is obtainable upon completing the World Quest [[Octave of the Maushiro]].
